Lots of lovely walks.  Also the church at the northern end of the island is lovely

value: Lots of camping opportunities on the island

Anna's Bed and Breakfast - a wonderful lovely little B&B run by a retired couple just off the island. To get to it, take the ferry from Bolmsö to Sunnaryd (free) and then turn right off the main road after 1km, Anna's B&B is on your left after 1km.  6 beds available, tel +46 70 308 7898
